observations.content:
[GAME] Welcome to Secret Mafia! You are Player 3.
Your role: Mafia
Team: Mafia
Description: A Mafia member. Eliminate villagers and gain majority.

Players: Player 0, Player 1, Player 2, Player 3, Player 4, Player 5

Your teammates are: Player 3, Player 5.

During DAY phase: Speak freely and vote.
During NIGHT phase: '[Player X]' to vote and eliminate a villager.
Win by eliminating villagers until Mafia equal or outnumber them.

[GAME] Night has fallen. Mafia, agree on a victim.
Valid targets: [0], [1], [2], [4]

error_log.error: BeliefState.__init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'my_role'
error_log.traceback:
Traceback (most recent call last):

        my_role=self.my_role or "unknown",
    ...<2 lines>...
        turn_number=self.turn_count
    )
TypeError: BeliefState.__init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'my_role'

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

        my_role=self.my_role or "unknown",
    ...<2 lines>...
        turn_number=self.turn_count
    )
TypeError: BeliefState.__init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'my_role'
